Articles.Content:
Gents,

Anybody know of an L-Shaped Truss or crew tunnel in any of the MODs? i would like something like the truss crew tunnel that comes within kosmos.. But cannt seem to find any...
Not a gameplay question. This would be better suited in the Addon Requests and Support forum, I think.

Gents,

Anybody know of an L-Shaped Truss or crew tunnel in any of the MODs? i would like something like the truss crew tunnel that comes within kosmos.. But cannt seem to find any...

Ion Hybrid Pack has a Tiny-sized L-shaped piece, referred to as an 'adapter'.

You could take two of the structural fuselages and join them at right angle using the radial atachment point. Then cap the end with a nosecone piece.

It isn't perfect, but it works. I did this on my weird little science lab thingy I put on the Mun. Here:

You can see the L-shaped, 90-degree angle white tunnel.
